title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-9.4 - Selection of scholarship nominees and publication of selection criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-9.4 - Selection of scholarship nominees and publication of selection criteria

State Regulations
(a) Each high
school shall select scholarship nominees using the criteria set forth in
section
145-9.5
of this Subpart, and shall
certify to the department on forms prescribed by the department the identity of
its scholarship nominees in priority rank order, using the methodology
prescribed in section
145-9.5
of this Subpart. (b) High schools shall publish and make
available to students the criteria used to select scholarship nominees at the
beginning of each school year. Such criteria shall be in accordance with the
requirements prescribed in section
145-9.5
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-9.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
